TopicTitle: Add stats to a part? And other misc questions.

Articles.Content:
I have few questions for the mod I'm working on, any help is greatly appreciated!

1. How would I go about adding stats view-able in the VAB/SPH, and making them accessible in code.

2. How would I add things to a parts right click menu?

3. What would be the best way of adding a new PartModule to a bunch of parts (in my case most of the stock parts).

4. Can I have some clarification on the difference between extending Part and extending PartModule? My current understanding is that extending PartModule allows its to be added in a parts config for the purpose of adding behaviors.

5. What exactly does explosionPotential do? I read about Harv saying that it makes a bigger explosion graphic and applies a force to nearby objects, but as far as I can tell, its been deprecated.

If I have anymore I'll add them, thanks for the help!
